scripts.prisma-pull-generate: ls schemas/*.prisma | while read -r schema; do pnpx prisma db pull --schema=$schema; done && pnpm prisma-generate
scripts.prisma-generate: ls schemas/*.prisma | while read -r schema; do bunx prisma generate --schema=$schema; done && rm -rf dist
scripts.dev: docker compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml up --force-recreate -d && bash wait-until-db-ready.bash
